title: Wayne’s World
description: Wayne (and with him, as always, is Garth) really knows how to party. Brought to you from his parents’ basement in Aurora, Illinois with the support of Noah’s Arcade.
altHero: Wayne and Garth in their basement studio
alt1: Wayne and Garth are joined by Ron Paxton, inventor of the Suck Kut
alt2: Wayne and Garth do a schwing at a picture of Cindy Crawford
alt3: Wayne talking with Noah Vanderhoff, Wayne’s index card says “Sphincter Boy” and points at Vanderhoff
